stories.title: Git file scoping utilities with all three scope methods
stories.description: Implement complete git integration for file scoping - single file validation, directory traversal via git ls-files, and commit history via git log --diff-filter=d. Includes graceful handling of empty results and edge cases (deleted files, renames, merges, binary files).

stories.title: Review manifest generation with file scoping support
stories.description: Enhance manifest generator to work with arbitrary file lists (not just feature-based git diffs). Supports filtering quality checks to scoped files where tools allow it, documenting which tools run project-wide. Complete review-first workflow with report saving to .hodge/reviews/ using timestamp-based naming.

stories.title: ReviewEngineService - shared review workflow core
stories.description: Extract and refactor common review logic from /harden into reusable ReviewEngineService. Handles manifest generation, quality checks, critical file selection (configurable - enabled for /harden, disabled for /review), and report generation. Designed to support both feature-based (harden) and file-based (review) modes with different report locations.

stories.title: Enhanced ReviewCommand with interactive fix workflow
stories.description: Complete implementation of enhanced ReviewCommand (hodge review CLI + /review slash command template) with --file, --directory, --last parameters. Implements review-first workflow sequence (manifest → AI review → interactive fix selection → optional auto-fix). Full integration with ReviewEngineService configured for file-based mode (no critical selection, reports to .hodge/reviews/, non-intrusive auto-fix).

stories.title: Migrate HardenCommand to use ReviewEngineService
stories.description: Migrate existing HardenCommand (hodge harden CLI + /harden slash command) to use the new ReviewEngineService while preserving ALL current behavior: fix-first workflow sequence, mandatory error fixing, feature-based scoping, critical file selection enabled, reports to .hodge/features/{{feature}}/harden/, validation gates. Ensures zero regression through comprehensive testing.
